tool_description: translate via google translate, bing translate
name: Cheap Translate
title: Cheap Translate

api_list.name: /goo/translate/languages
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cheap-translate.p.rapidapi.com/goo/translate/languages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cheap-translate.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
